phrs.translation: 避免, 避开, 回避, 张顺
信兴广场, 地王大厦, 信兴广场地王大厦, 信兴广场地王大厦介绍

sentences.sentence: They wear simple clothes and shun modern contrivances.
sentences.translation: 他们穿着简单，避免了现代装束。

sentences.sentence: More discriminating visitors now tend to shun the area.
sentences.translation: 更多有鉴别能力的游客现在趋向于避开此地。

sentences.sentence: "Humans should not try to avoid stress any more than they would shun food, love or exercise," said Dr. Hans Selye, the first physician to document the effects of stress on the body.
sentences.translation: 汉斯·塞尔耶是第一个记录压力对身体影响的医生，他说：“人们不应该试图逃避压力，就像他们不逃避食物、爱或锻炼。”
